def_cn: （人、动植物的）寿命，预期生命期限
def_en: The lifespan of a person, animal, or plant is the period of time for which they live or are normally expected to live.

def_cn: （产品等的）预期使用期限；（组织、想法等的）预期存在期限
def_en: The lifespan of a product, organization, or idea is the period of time for which it is expected to work properly or to last.
